Articles.Content:
> 
> Mission: transfer Jebediah out of the long-inactive Duna 'Spress CTV, return him to KSC. (What the heck, start with something boring.)
> 
> ![LHTJLXd.png](http://i.imgur.com/LHTJLXd.png)
> 
> "What, you wanted a simple crew transfer vehicle. This just so happens to fit the bill as a crew transfer vehicle, regardless of the fact that it's a painstaking replica of the Soyuz rocket family."
> 
> - Werner von Kermann
> 
> ![n8DXzpm.png](http://i.imgur.com/n8DXzpm.png)
> 
> "Using main stage to circularize in orbit. Wow. Um, perhaps there was a bit of an overdesign?" -Valentina
> 
> "Nonsense. I, uh, planned it this way." -Werner von Kerman
> 
> ![RoNf8e2.png](http://i.imgur.com/RoNf8e2.png)
> 
> "Docking attempt no. 35 is go. Valentina, if you screw this one up again, so help me Kod." - Gene 
> 
> ![1MOoClC.png](http://i.imgur.com/1MOoClC.png)
> 
> Post-docking, crew returns to Kerbin not too far away from KSC.
> 
> 

More to come later, including a full Laythe colonization attempt.
